rules_text:
Tower of Remains enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool.
When Tower of Remains is put into a graveyard from anywhere, add {B} or {G} to your mana pool.
notes: *Each nation constructed a tower built to collapse on the Third Day the World Shook — each filled with their most important resource, so that they can be a) maintained and b) spread to the masses on the day that the world stills once more. The Aghesh has its own "tower", but it's not quite the same.
